CRUDlex\\UniqueValidator

.. php:namespace: CRUDlex

.. php:class:: UniqueValidator

    A validator to check for an unique field.

    .. php:method:: isValid($value, $parameters)

        {@inheritdoc}

        :param $value:
        :param $parameters:

    .. php:method:: getInvalidDetails()
